title: 97/791/EC, Euratom: Council Decision of 20 November 1997 appointing a member of the Economic and Social Committee
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 20 November 1997 appointing a member of the Economic and Social Committee (97/791/EC, Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 194 thereof,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular Article 166 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 26 September 1994 appointing the members of the Economic and Social Committee for the period up to 20 September 1998 (1),
Whereas a set as a member of that committee has fallen vacant following the resignation of Mr Henri Bordes-Pages, of which the Council was notified on 21 January 1997;
Having regard to the nominations submitted by the French Government,
Having obtained the opinion of the Commission of the European Communities,
main_body: Mr Claude Cambus is hereby appointed a member of the Economic and Social Committee in place of Mr Henri Bordes-Pages for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which runs until 20 September 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 November 1997.
For the Council
The President
E. HENNICOT-SCHOEPGES
(1) OJ L 257, 5. 10. 1994, p. 20.
